amendment.description: An amendment to add a new section prohibiting the use of funds for participation by U.S. delegates to the Standing Consultive Commission in any activity to implement the Memorandum of Understanding Relating to the Treaty between the U.S. and the Soviet Union on the Limitations of Anti-Ballistic Missile Systems entered into on September 26, 1997.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Vitter amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
